title: Anomalous increase in gateway requests per second detected
description: It monitors for a sudden spike in gateway requests per second, which may signal abnormal usage, abuse, or misconfiguration. Persistent increases can strain system resources and impact network performance.

definition.name: Anomalous increase in gateway requests per second detected
definition.query: avg(last_1d):anomalies(throughput(sum:iboss.gateway_performance.total_request_count{!gateway_name:none,!gateway_name:all_gateways} by {gateway_name}), 'agile', 2, direction='above', interval=300, alert_window='last_1h', seasonality='hourly', timezone='utc', count_default_zero='true') >= 1
